attributes.action: take action against the American GOVERNMENT for human rights abuses at Guantanamo Bay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I've just read a petition asking for sanctions to be taken against America for these human rights abuses.  I agree with the implied condemnation of these abuses but I'm concerned that SANCTIONS would impact on ordinary American citizens - probably the poorest at that - many of whom may themselves be opposed to what is happening in Guantanamo Bay.
